member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants
member.summary: General constants for Microsoft Identity Web.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.LoginHint
member.summary: LoginHint. Represents the preferred_username claim in the ID token.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.DomainHint
member.summary: DomainHint. Determined by the tenant Id.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.Claims
member.summary: Claims. Determined from the signed-in user.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.Bearer
member.summary: Bearer. Predominant type of access token used with OAuth 2.0.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.AzureAd
member.summary: AzureAd. Configuration section name for AzureAd.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.AzureAdB2C
member.summary: AzureAdB2C. Configuration section name for AzureAdB2C.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.Policy
member.summary: Policy for B2C user flows. The name of the policy to check against a specific user flow.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Constants.SpaAuthCode
member.summary: SpaAuthCode. Key to retreive SpaAuthCode from the HttpContext.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.IDWebErrorMessage
member.summary: Constants related to the error messages.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.LogMessages
member.summary: Constants related to the log messages.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Util.Base64UrlHelpers.Encode(System.String)
member.summary: The following functions perform base64url encoding which differs from regular base64 encoding as follows * padding is skipped so the pad character '=' doesn't have to be percent encoded * the 62nd and 63rd regular base64 encoding characters ('+' and '/') are replace with ('-' and '_') The changes make the encoding alphabet file and URL safe.
member.returns: Base64Url encoding of the UTF8 bytes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Util.Base64UrlHelpers.Encode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64-url digits. Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array, and the number of elements in the array to convert.
member.param: The number of elements of inArray to convert.
member.returns: The string representation in base 64 url encoding of length elements of inArray, starting at position offset.
member.exception: offset or length is negative OR offset plus length is greater than the length of inArray.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Util.Base64UrlHelpers.Encode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts a subset of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64-url digits. Parameters specify the subset as an offset in the input array, and the number of elements in the array to convert.
member.returns: The string representation in base 64 url encoding of length elements of inArray, starting at position offset.
member.exception: offset or length is negative OR offset plus length is greater than the length of inArray.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Util.Base64UrlHelpers.DecodeBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string, which encodes binary data as base-64-url digits, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Util.Base64UrlHelpers.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the string from Base64UrlEncoded to UTF8.
